clinical_history: Urinary difficulty and suspected prostate enlargement.
findings: Breast tissue shows unremarkable lesion measuring 31.56 mm.
Soft tissue region demonstrates enlarged without fluid collection.
Uterus appears mildly thickened; endometrial thickness measures 13.7 mm.
Urinary bladder is smooth-walled, no intraluminal lesions.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 1.55 bpm.
Thyroid gland shows mildly thickened echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
